It requires 30 Attack and 30 Magic to wield. The mystic mud staff is an even stronger alternative, providing better melee and magic stat bonuses.

Item ID6562

A mud battlestaff is a mud elemental staff which provides unlimited amounts of water and earth runes as well as the autocast option when equipped. It requires 30 Attack and 30 Magic to wield. The mystic mud staff is an even stronger alternative, providing better melee and magic stat bonuses.

Wielding a mud battlestaff is ideal for curse spells, as almost all of them use both water and earth runes.

The staff is only obtainable as a potential drop from Dagannoth Prime.

[[File:Mud battlestaff detail.png|left|140px]]
A '''mud battlestaff''' is a mud [[Elemental staves|elemental staff]] which provides unlimited amounts of [[Water rune|water]] and [[Earth rune|earth]] runes as well as the [[autocast]] option when equipped. It requires 30 [[Attack]] and 30 [[Magic]] to wield. The [[mystic mud staff]] is an even stronger alternative, providing better melee and magic stat bonuses.

Wielding a mud battlestaff is ideal for [[curse spells]], as almost all of them use both water and earth runes.

The staff is only obtainable as a potential drop from [[Dagannoth Prime]].
